name: async-fn
description: A helper for unit testing to create mocks/spies that can additionally asynchronously resolve and reject while retaining simplicity.

scripts.build-and-publish-major-version: npm run build-all-packages && npm test && lerna publish major --yes --no-push && git push && git push --tags
scripts.build-and-publish-minor-version: npm run build-all-packages && npm test && lerna publish minor --yes --no-push && git push && git push --tags
scripts.build-and-publish-patch-version: npm run build-all-packages && npm test && lerna publish patch --yes --no-push && git push && git push --tags

author: Team: Igniter from Houston Inc. Consulting
